import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Header, Icon, Image, Menu, Segment, Sidebar } from "semantic-ui-react"; import "./Header.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Items from "../../scenes/item"; export default class SidebarExampleSidebar extends Component { state = { visible: false }; handleSidebarHide = () => this.setState({ visible: false }); handleSidebarToggle = () => this.setState(prevState => ({ visible: !prevState.visible })); render() { const item = [ { id: "1", name: "Milk" }, { id: "2", name: "Matcha" }, { id: "3", name: "Tea" }, { id: "4", name: "Coffee" } ]; const renderItems = (items, index) => { return ( {items.id} {items.name} ); }; const { visible } = this.state; return (
Home Items Units Transactions Stocks
Web Application






Items

{item.map(renderItems)}
ID NAME
); } }
